name: Introduction to React
description: Basic principles of React and component-based development.

lessons.name: What is React?
lessons.description: Introduction to React library and its core concepts.

lessons.name: JSX Fundamentals
lessons.description: Understanding JSX syntax and how to write React components.

lessons.name: Components and Props
lessons.description: Creating reusable components and passing data with props.

name: State and Event Handling
description: Managing component state and handling user interactions.

lessons.name: useState Hook
lessons.description: Managing state in functional components with useState.

lessons.name: Event Handling
lessons.description: Handling user events and form interactions.

lessons.name: Conditional Rendering
lessons.description: Rendering components conditionally based on state.

name: Advanced React Concepts
description: Advanced React patterns and optimization techniques.

lessons.name: useEffect Hook
lessons.description: Managing side effects and lifecycle with useEffect.

lessons.name: Context API
lessons.description: Sharing state across components with Context.

lessons.name: Performance Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing React applications for better performance.

name: Frontend Development Fundamentals
description: Core concepts of frontend web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Backend Development with Node.js
description: Server-side development using Node.js and Express framework.

name: Full Stack Integration
description: Connecting frontend and backend for complete web applications.

name: Relational Database Design
description: Fundamentals of relational database design and normalization.

name: SQL and Query Optimization
description: Advanced SQL queries and database performance optimization.

name: NoSQL Databases
description: Introduction to NoSQL databases and document-oriented storage.

name: Algorithm Analysis and Complexity
description: Understanding time and space complexity analysis of algorithms.

name: Sorting and Searching Algorithms
description: Implementation and analysis of fundamental sorting and searching algorithms.

name: Graph Algorithms
description: Advanced algorithms for graph traversal and shortest path problems.

name: Linear Data Structures
description: Arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues implementation and applications.

name: Tree Data Structures
description: Binary trees, BSTs, AVL trees, and heap data structures.

name: Hash Tables and Graphs
description: Hash table implementation and graph representation techniques.

name: User-Centered Design
description: Principles of designing interfaces centered around user needs and behaviors.

name: Usability Testing and Evaluation
description: Methods for testing and evaluating user interface effectiveness.

name: Accessibility and Inclusive Design
description: Creating accessible interfaces for users with diverse abilities.

name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Fundamental concepts and history of artificial intelligence.

name: Machine Learning Basics
description: Introduction to supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms.

name: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
description: Understanding neural networks and deep learning architectures.
